name: STRANDED-as an alien taxi driver
description:
Having a bad day?

Dont worry-Günther´s      day is way worse...

The alien taxi driver, stranded on an chaotic island, has to recover his vehicles spare parts to escape the madness of this top-down shooter.

Get ready to explore the island, fight yourself through chaotic monsters and help Günther to repair his beloved P420/42 SpaceTaxiR .

Have fun 

(FLASH WARNING)
